channel.title: ACF on GID
channel.description: Recent content in ACF on GID

item.title: Autocorrelation Functions for Time Series
item.description: This post aims to provide some theoretical background on autocorrelation functions and how to use them to analyze time series. Furthermore, we show how to use the Autocorrelation (ACF) function and the Partial Autocorrelation (PACF) function to determine the parameters for an ARMA model. Brief introduction to time series In a previous post (see here), we introduced some basic definitions and terminology about time series. We repeat the same definitions here to avoid forcing the reader to move back and forth.
